FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

FAQ

We accept most common file formats including PDF, AI, EPS, PSD, and high-resolution JPG/PNG files. For best results, we recommend using PDF files with embedded fonts and images at 300 DPI or higher.

Standard orders are typically completed within 3-5 business days. We also offer rush services for faster turnaround times. Contact us for specific timing based on your project requirements.

Yes! Our professional design team can create custom designs for all your printing needs. We also offer design modifications to existing artwork. Contact us to discuss your design requirements.

We offer a wide range of paper stocks including matte, glossy, and soft-touch finishes. Our selection includes various weights and textures to suit your specific needs. Contact us for samples or specific stock options.
